param.name: allevents
param.label: Show
param.description: Select whether to show all event or just events from single category

param.name: eventcatid
param.label: Category ID
param.description: Type the id of the selected category you want to display (category mode must be enable in the Show settings)

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Width of the calendar, in pixels

param.name: month
param.label: Month
param.description: Type the number of a month (1, 2, 12) if you want to show a specific month

param.name: year
param.label: Year
param.description: Type a year (2011, 2012) if you want to show a specific year

param.name: activecalbgcolor
param.label: Highlighted Day BG Color
param.description: Enter the color to be used for the highlighted days in the calander - use css known color like red, green,... or hexa like #000000 - If empty green will be used as default

param.name: activecaltextcolor
param.label: Highlighted Day Text Color
param.description: Enter the color to be used for the highlighted days in the calander - use css known color like red, green,... or hexa like #000000 - If empty black will be used as default

param.name: prevnext
param.label: Prev-Next Month
param.description: Select whether to show or hide the previous/next month navigation

param.name: showheader
param.label: Calendar header
param.description: Select whether to show or hide the calendar header

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
